verses.text: Ha t'a sti' ha ha' t'a yol yic Babilonia, onh em k'ojan ayic ix co naancot Sion, ix onh ok' b'ian.
Ix cak'q'ue locan te' arpa t'a sk'ab' te' tak'u ay t'a sti' ha ha' chi'.
Ha eb' ix onh ik'anb'at icha t'a preso, ix b'uchvaj eb' t'ayonh, ix yalan eb' icha tik: B'itananhec t'a tzalajk'olal, a sb'ital Sion tze b'itej t'ayonh, xchi eb'.
¿Tom ol co b'itej b'it yic Jehová t'a lum ch'oc chonhab'il? xco chi.
Tato sb'at satk'olal Jerusalén vuuj, satocab' sjelanil in wach' k'ab' tik in chalan te' varpa.
Tato manhxo naanoc Jerusalén vuuj, tato manhxa pax in gana t'ay t'a yichanh pax tas snib'ej in k'ool, canocab' lotznaj vak' t'a in joom, yic wach' manhxo ol yal-laj in b'itani.
Mamin Jehová, nacot eb' aj Edom, yujto ayic ix yamchaj chonhab' Jerusalén, ix yal eb' icha tik: Pojequemi, pojequemi, masanto scheclaj cimientoal yich, xchi eb'.
Ex aj Babilonia, ol ex satpaxeloc. Te wach' yic mach ol ak'anek' spac chukal tas ix onh eyutej.
Te wach' yic mach ol yaman eb' eyuninal, ol smak'anpoj sjolom eb' t'a spatictac q'uen q'ueen.
